name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: chatpdf for PDFs powered by ChatGPT™

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use chatgpt for PDF and chat with any PDF using Open AI™ ChatGPT™ and revolutionize the way you interact with PDFs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ChatPDF is an AI-powered chatbot that accepts PDFs as 'prompts' (inputs) and can summarize, answer questions, analyze for a quick extraction (find a particular text or paragraph), and is able to translate PDFs. You do not even need to create an account if you do not wish to; you can head to the website and get started.
